title: Episode 291: Lizzo

title: Music Festival Attendees Face Hurdles Testing Substances Despite Overdose Crisis, Study Finds
description: High costs, legal confusion and festival restrictions are preventing attendees from using potentially life-saving drug testing tools, according to new research conducted at a Colorado EDM festival.

title: Afrika Bambaataa Loses Child Sex Abuse and Trafficking Lawsuit via Default Judgment
description: In 2021, a man sued Afrika Bambaataa, alleging that the musician abused him for years in the 1990s. The hip-hop pioneer never acknowledged the lawsuit, leading to a default judgment against him.
